        public static int convert2BytesHexaFormatToInt(byte[] arrayToConvert)
        Converts a big-endian 2-byte Array To int Format (decimal)1876 = (hexadecimal)0754 Example: convert2BytesHexaFormatToInt {0x07, 0x54} -> returns 1876
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        integer value

      • reverseByteArray

        public static byte[] reverseByteArray(byte[] uid)
        Reverses a byte array. Example: reverseByteArray ({0xE0, 0x02, 0x4D, 0xFF}) {0xFF, 0x4D, 0x02, 0x0E}
        Returns:
